activities: WorldAPP Inc. provides data collection software which allows companies from all the around the world develop forms which can be used to collect all types of information, including but not limited to personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: WorldAPP Inc collects organization information including the name, telephone, email, address and credit card information of our customers. WorldAPP's customer have the ability to collect data, which is covered under our privacy policy.
recoursemech:
We use TRUSTe as our independent recourse mechanism to investigate and mediate any unresolved complaints;

EU data protection authorities (DPAs) for HR data.
